DocAttribute.Name: DefiningValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of defining values, which determine the defined values.

DocAttribute.Name: DefinedValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defined values which are applicable for the scope as defined by the defining values.

DocAttribute.Name: Expression
DocAttribute.Documentation: Expression for the derivation of defined values from the defining values, the expression is given for information only, i.e. no automatic processing can be expected from the expression.

DocAttribute.Name: DefiningUnit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit for the defining values, if not given, the default value for the measure type (given by the TYPE of the defining values) is used as defined by the global unit assignment at IfcProject.

DocAttribute.Name: DefinedUnit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit for the defined values, if not given, the default value for the measure type (given by the TYPE of the defined values) is used as defined by the global unit assignment at IfcProject.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of members in the list of defining values shall be the same as the number of members in the list of defined values.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All values within the list of defining values shall have the same measure type.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All values within the list of defined values shall have the same measure type.
